page.title: 13Supernatural-Pevensey.
page.content:
Ghosts are what? Are they true or false? Some people in Pevensey say they've seen sightings of a{ghost. The first sighting of this ghost was at a farmhouse.When a mother and daughter returned home from church. They found the son in the living room with a gun across his lap.He claimed to have seen a ghost of a{milk maid }with chains tied to her. The Mint House is haunted by several ghosts.There is a {headless ghost } and a lady who had her tongue pulled out .There is also a man,who was having a duel in his room and was forced out of the window.He fell on a sword.He still haunts the Old Mint House.The Royal Oak and Castle,public house is supposed to be haunted by a friendly ghost called Vera.
{ }.
